name: Dhaka Food Festival
description: A culinary extravaganza featuring a wide array of delicious dishes from various cuisines.
service: Food stalls, live music, and entertainment

name: Bangladesh Fashion Week
description: A showcase of the latest fashion trends and designs by local and international designers.
service: Fashion shows, designer exhibitions, and workshops

name: Dhaka International Film Festival
description: A celebration of world cinema with screenings of diverse and thought-provoking films.
service: Film screenings, discussions, and filmmaker interactions

name: Bengali New Year Celebration
description: Ring in the Bengali New Year with traditional music, dance, and cultural performances.
service: Cultural performances, traditional food, and crafts

name: Bangladesh Tech Expo
description: Explore the latest technological innovations and gadgets in the tech industry.
service: Tech product exhibitions, workshops, and tech talks

name: Bangladesh Art Expo
description: An exhibition showcasing the finest art and sculptures from Bangladesh.
service: Art displays, artist meet-and-greet, and art auctions
